channel.title: Projects on Oliver Wilkie
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Oliver Wilkie

item.title: That That This
item.description: A small, cheap and useful iOS App for making decisions using a framework called Analytic Hierachy.

item.title: JRNL Bitbar
item.description: A BitBar plugin for quickly viewing and adding new topics into your Jrnl.sh

item.title: Paper Gamer
item.description: A game center for playing Telephone and Salad Bowl remotely with friends during the COVID-19 lockdown.

item.title: Even Steven
item.description: An iOS App for shared expenses amongst groups. Built in 2016 (but alas no longer available)

item.title: Masters Thesis
item.description: Researching motion stabilisation techniques for creating the illusion of a non-beating heart during laproscopic surgery.
